name: darktable
description: [darktable]({{ project_url }}) is an open source photography workflow application and raw developer. A virtual lighttable and darkroom for photographers. It manages your digital negatives in a database, lets you view them through a zoomable lighttable and enables you to develop raw images and enhance them.

volumes.description: Users home directory in the container, stores program settings and images

title: Darktable
